suite.name: BMICTests

test.name: Scenario: Calculate BMI for Normal Weight Person

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.arg: msg=BMI calculator module not found at ${BMI_MODULE}
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Setting up test for BMI calculator
kw.arg: Setting up test for BMI calculator
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Given the BMI calculator is available
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: When I calculate BMI with height "175" cm and weight "70" kg
kw.source_name: I calculate BMI with height "${height}" cm and weight "${weight}" kg

kw.name: Calculate Bmi
kw.doc: Calculate BMI (Body Mass Index) and determine the weight category.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then the BMI result should be "22.9"
Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: And the BMI category should be "Normal weight"
Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: No Operation
kw.doc: Does absolutely nothing.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.name: Scenario: Validate Error for Missing Height

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.arg: msg=BMI calculator module not found at ${BMI_MODULE}
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Setting up test for BMI calculator
kw.arg: Setting up test for BMI calculator
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Given the BMI calculator is available
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: When I calculate BMI with height "" cm and weight "70" kg
kw.source_name: I calculate BMI with height "${height}" cm and weight "${weight}" kg

kw.name: Calculate Bmi
kw.doc: Calculate BMI (Body Mass Index) and determine the weight category.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: BMI Result: (None, 'Error: Please enter your height')
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: BMI Category: Error: Please enter your height
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then an error should be reported
Should Be Equal
kw.arg: msg=Expected an error (None BMI value) but got: ${BMI_VALUE}
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: And the error should contain "Please enter your height"
Should Contain
kw.arg: msg=Expected error message containing '${expected_text}' but got: ${BMI_CATEGORY}
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: No Operation
kw.doc: Does absolutely nothing.

kw.name: When I calculate BMI with height "0" cm and weight "70" kg
kw.source_name: I calculate BMI with height "${height}" cm and weight "${weight}" kg

kw.name: Calculate Bmi
kw.msg: ${result} = (None, 'Error: Height must be a positive number')
kw.doc: Calculate BMI (Body Mass Index) and determine the weight category.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.msg: ${BMI_CATEGORY} = Error: Height must be a positive number
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: BMI Result: (None, 'Error: Height must be a positive number')
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: BMI Category: Error: Height must be a positive number
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then an error should be reported
Should Be Equal
kw.arg: msg=Expected an error (None BMI value) but got: ${BMI_VALUE}
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: And the error should contain "Height must be a positive number"
Should Contain
kw.arg: msg=Expected error message containing '${expected_text}' but got: ${BMI_CATEGORY}
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: No Operation
kw.doc: Does absolutely nothing.
